name: Tiny Miracle
flower_description: A flower that grew from a rock, breaking through the stone as it strove to reach the light.
feather_description: A feather from a bird of prey that flies almost too fast for the human eye to detect.
sand_description: Just an ordinary everyday hourglass. Turn it upside down and sure enough, the dry sand starts trickling down like water.
goblet_description: A cup commonly used for fortunetelling. It can also hold water, of course.
circlet_description: A cheap accessory that is actually made from ancient meteoric ore.
four_pc_bonus: Incoming Elemental DMG increases corresponding Elemental RES by 30% for 10s. Can only occur once every 10s.
